headline: ALCATEL ROTARY VANE VACUUM PUMP 7 CFM
description: Two Stage   Rotary Vacuum Vacuum Pump        Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model 2008 A
Pumping Speed 7.0 CFM (197.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-3(En) torr (1.33E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Refurbished YES
Duty--Service Normal
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 0.5 HP
Rotational Speed 1,800 RPM
Oil Type Hydrocarbon
Oil Capacity Minimum: 1.00 L (1.06 qt, 0.22 Br gal)
Other Information

Partial pressure 1E-4 mBar (Pneurop method, without gas ballast)

Power Requirements 120 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 5.500 in (14.0 cm)
Depth 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Height 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Weight 52 lb (24 kg)
